Metomidate bụ imidazole na-abụghị barbiturate na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site na afo nwela onwa nke Janssen Pharmaceutica chọpụtara na 1965 ma n'okpuru aha (Hypnodil, Nokemyl) ka a na-ere dị ka ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị iji gwọọ mmadụ na maka ebumnuche anụmanụ.
11C-labelled metomidate (11C-metomidate), nwere ike iji ya na positron emission tomography (PET)
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ịchọpụta akpụ sitere na adrenocortical.
